about_the_game:
Plot Introduction

In the 13280 year of Emperor Xuan, a meteorite fell from the sky and demons from outside the region invaded.

All the heavenly demons burn, kill, and plunder, committing all kinds of evil.

Emperor Xuantian led Fei, Wan, and other respected figures, along with various experts such as the Birthday Emperor Sect and Demon Lord, to jointly encounter the enemy.

This battle is extremely fierce, with a large number of demons outside the region and extremely tenacious vitality.

In the end, a group of experts including Fei Zun, Wan Zun, and Demon Zun sacrificed themselves and passed on their merits to Emperor Xuantian. Emperor Xuantian finally killed all the demons outside the region. And then lost track...

Ten thousand years later, by the river in Huangfengling, a young man woke up...


【 Kind reminder 】

The attributes added for upgrading this game are all based on mental skills. Please cultivate your mental skills to 25% progress before upgrading (check the progress from the status).

Only after equipping the soul can weapons be equipped. What weapons can be equipped depends on the type of soul equipped
